2fc30e81-4f2d-4ed6-b7e6-f7dfadc54461.description: Earners of the DigiCert PKI Fundamentals Professional certification have developed a foundational understanding of public key infrastructure (PKI). They have a grasp of the security benefits offered by a PKI across a broad range of use cases including user and device security, IoT device management, code singing, and document singing. The course includes an introduction to DigiCert ONE, the new cloud-native PKI platform.
2fc30e81-4f2d-4ed6-b7e6-f7dfadc54461.name: PKI Fundamentals - DigiCert Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the DigiCert Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) Fundamentals course.
Pass the DigiCert Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) Fundamentals exam.

043e5c3e-7006-4bbf-9a6b-4b5838d4a66b.description: Earners of the DigiCert PKI Sales Professional certification have developed a foundational understanding of public key infrastructure (PKI). They have a grasp of the security benefits offered by a PKI across a broad range of use cases ranging from enterprise user and device security, to IoT device management, code singing, and document singing.
043e5c3e-7006-4bbf-9a6b-4b5838d4a66b.name: PKI Platform 8 - Sales Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Selling DigiCert PKI Platform 8 course.
Pass the Selling DigiCert PKI Platform 8 exam.

5d4bcddf-e7f9-4175-8911-cc37458eb0b0.description: Earners of the DigiCert Trust Lifecycle Manager Sales Professional certification have developed specialised skills in gathering requirements for an enterprise certificate lifecycle management and PKI services solution. They can can make recommendations to organisations seeking to implement a PKI with DigiCert Trust Lifecycle Manager.
5d4bcddf-e7f9-4175-8911-cc37458eb0b0.name: Trust Lifecycle Manager Sales Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the course "Selling Trust Lifecycle Manager"
Pass the DigiCert "Selling Trust Lifecycle Manager" exam.

2bf003e6-c01c-4691-9ba3-1fc5b4dadef8.description: The TLS/SSL Professional has demonstrated a detailed knowledge of TLS/SSL technology, including TLS/SSL certificates, encryption technologies, validation methods, threats and attacks on TLS/SSL security, future industry trends and best practices for deployment.
2bf003e6-c01c-4691-9ba3-1fc5b4dadef8.name: DigiCert TLS/SSL Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Score a passing grade in DigiCert TLS/SSL Professional exam.

2bc4c6ef-d352-4f73-b559-3cde52a16e2d.description: Earners of the DigiCert Software Trust Manager Sales Professional certification have developed specialised skills in gathering requirements for a public key infrastructure (PKI) to support modern development operations code signing. They have a grasp of the security benefits offered by a PKI to sign applications, maintain the integrity of devices, and to facilitate with continuous integration and development.
2bc4c6ef-d352-4f73-b559-3cde52a16e2d.name: Software Trust Manager - Sales Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Selling DigiCert Software Trust Manager course.
Pass the Selling DigiCert Software Trust Manager exam.

86c1724b-555f-4aa8-84e3-eb38bd12934f.description: Earners of the DigiCert Device Trust Sales Professional certification have developed specialised skills in gathering requirements for a public key infrastructure (PKI) for IoT device manufactures and chip manufacturer. They have a grasp of the security benefits offered by a PKI to manage and control IoT device authentication, integrity and encryption. They can make recommendations to organisations seeking to implement a new or update their existing PKI with DigiCert ONE IoT Device Manager.
86c1724b-555f-4aa8-84e3-eb38bd12934f.name: Device Trust - Sales Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Selling Device Trust course.
Pass the Selling DigiCert Device Trust exam.

a7a9eb98-6580-4277-a43e-738f5ad14ec9.description: The CertCentral Professional has demonstrated a detailed knowledge of the DigiCert® CertCentral® certificate management platform. This includes management of TLS certificates and options, platform administration and deployment of advanced features including certificate scanning and the use of the ACME protocol for automated certificate deployment.
a7a9eb98-6580-4277-a43e-738f5ad14ec9.name: DigiCert CertCentral Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Score a passing grade in DigiCert CertCentral Professional exam.

783eba87-3bce-43e2-bd01-82c461c7912f.description: Earners of the Document Trust Manager Sales Professional certification have developed specialised skills in gathering requirements for a public key infrastructure (PKI) for large enterprises seeking to implement a digital document signing solution. They have a grasp of the security benefits offered by a PKI to automate individual document signing, organisational mass signing and privacy and data protection regulations.
783eba87-3bce-43e2-bd01-82c461c7912f.name: Document Trust Manager - Sales Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Selling DigiCert Document Trust Manager course.
Pass the Selling DigiCert Document Trust Manager exam.

78885e03-3375-41a9-ac12-85dec0b6b5e6.description: The TLS Associate has demonstrated knowledge of both TLS/SSL certificates and the DigiCert® CertCentral® certificate management platform. They understand the advantages of different certificate types and options and can use CertCentral to efficiently manage the certificate lifecycle.
78885e03-3375-41a9-ac12-85dec0b6b5e6.name: DigiCert TLS Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Score a passing grade in DigiCert TLS Associate exam.

7ba9462b-6794-4915-9079-9c8a615a614e.description: Earners of the PKI Sales Expert certification have developed specialised skills in gathering requirements for a broad range of public key infrastructure (PKI) use cases by completing five DigiCert PKI sales professional certifications. They have a grasp of the security benefits offered by a PKI. They have an understanding of the PKI market and can make recommendations to organisations seeking to implement a new or update their existing PKI.
7ba9462b-6794-4915-9079-9c8a615a614e.name: DigiCert PKI Sales Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Complete all courses in the DigiCert Sales Professional learning plan
Pass all course exams in the DigiCert Sales Professional learning plan

206d29a2-5a17-494c-861f-aac9b8385b35.description: Earners of the DigiCert Enterprise PKI Manager Sales Professional certification have developed specialised skills in gathering requirements for a public key infrastructure (PKI) for large enterprises. They have a grasp of the security benefits offered by a PKI to secure email, support WiFI authentication, secure remote access, and mobile device management. They can can make recommendations to organisations seeking to implement a PKI with DigiCert ONE Enterprise PKI Manager.
206d29a2-5a17-494c-861f-aac9b8385b35.name: Enterprise PKI Manager Sales Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the course "Selling Enterprise PKI Manager"
Pass the DigiCert "Selling Enterprise PKI Manager" exam.

d1eb9942-3409-4695-bb28-8c61d15ee393.description: Earners of the PKI Platform 8 Technical Professional certification have hands-on experience planning the deployment and installation of an entperprise public key infrastructure (PKI). They can configure DigiCert PKI Platform 8 to support user authentication, email security, remote access, and secure comminications. They can integrate the solution with existing entperpirse security infrastructure, and can configure certificate policies for a wide variety of common PKI use cases.
d1eb9942-3409-4695-bb28-8c61d15ee393.name: PKI Platform 8 Technical Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Administering DigiCert PKI 8 course.
Pass the DigiCert PKI 8 Technical Professional exam.

3200b500-6afc-41b9-b8b8-f6385212824e.description: Earners of the DigiCert ONE Technical Professional certification have developed specialised skills in gathering requirements and planning the deployment of a public key infrastructure (PKI) for large enterprises, device manufacturers, and large software development organisations. They have developed an understanding of cloud native software architecture and can install an on-premise, cloud, and hybrid PKI.
3200b500-6afc-41b9-b8b8-f6385212824e.name: DigiCert ONE Technical Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the course Deploying DigiCert One Core Services
Pass the Deploying DigiCert One Core Services exam

aba758ba-923e-405a-883e-bb72392c8f9f.description: Earners of the DigiCert PKI Fundamentals Professional Certification have developed a foundational understanding of public key infrastructure (PKI). They have a grasp of the security benefits offered by PKI across a broad range of use cases ranging from enterprise identity and access management, to IoT device management, code signing, and document signing.
aba758ba-923e-405a-883e-bb72392c8f9f.name: DigiCert ONE Fundamentals Technical Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the DigiCert ONE Fundamentals exam.

c4b00a12-7740-42e2-b67f-f58168dac282.description: Earners of the Digital Certificates Sales Professional certification have developed specialized skills in understanding digital certificate needs. They have a grasp of the benefits offered by DigiCert digital certificates and can make recommendations to the org which best addresses their needs (then providing solutions to customers' Digital Certificate needs)
c4b00a12-7740-42e2-b67f-f58168dac282.name: Digital Certificates Sales Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of the Digital Certificates Sales Professional certification have developed specialized skills in understanding digital certificate needs. They have a grasp of the benefits offered by DigiCert digital certificates and can make recommendations to the org which best addresses their needs (then providing solutions to customers' Digital Certificate needs)

61a9db5e-f655-4cd2-b9fd-6db8d4cd9f7a.description: Earners of the TLS and Digital Certificates Sales Professional certification have developed specialised skills in gathering requirements for the TLS/SSL and digital certificates that are included within DigiCert’s solution offerings.
61a9db5e-f655-4cd2-b9fd-6db8d4cd9f7a.name: DigiCert TLS & Digital Certificates Sales Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the course "Selling DigiCert TLS & Digital Certificates"
Pass the DigiCert "Selling DigiCert TLS & Digital Certificates" exam.

a7ea63b7-a157-44e2-8356-8b6e8e36e783.description: The Automation Expert has demonstrated a detailed knowledge of the DigiCert® CertCentral® Discovery and Automation features. This includes installation, configuration, management and troubleshooting of Discovery sensors, automation agents and "agentless" automation options, as well as configuration and management of Discovery scans and certificate lifecycle automation.
a7ea63b7-a157-44e2-8356-8b6e8e36e783.name: DigiCert Automation Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Score a passing grade in DigiCert CertCentral Automation Expert exam.

2579ab54-5059-471f-8429-4ae8caeb67e0.description: Earners of the Software Trust Manager Technical Professional certification have developed specialized skills in gathering requirements and planning the deployment of a Software Trust Manager implementation. They can perform initial configuration of the service including license management, account setup, and certificate authority (CA) configuration. Badge earners are able to modify built-in certificate templates, automate certificate enrollment methods, and configure cert issuance workflows.
2579ab54-5059-471f-8429-4ae8caeb67e0.name: DigiCert Software Trust Manager Technical Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the course Administering DigiCert Software Trust Manager
Pass the Administering DigiCert Software Trust Manager exam

587b394d-8e58-45d8-9cd4-d575c3867f49.description: Earners of the TLS Premium Entitlements Sales Professional certification have developed specialised skills in gathering requirements for the Premium Entitlements that are included within DigiCert’s Premium TLS Certificate offerings.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the course "Selling DigiCert TLS Premium Entitlements"
Pass the DigiCert "Selling DigiCert TLS Premium Entitlements" exam.

699fb4e5-0a83-47e9-8c9f-857408a0bdd3.description: Earners of the Enterprise PKI Manager Technical Professional certification have a hands-on experience planning the deployment and installation of an entperprise public key infrastructure (PKI).
